alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest; Niihau (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 01 at 7:22AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON FOR KAUAI AND NIIHAU... ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Niihau and Kauai. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Flood prone roads and other low lying areas may be closed due to elevated runoff and overflowing streams. Urban areas may receive more significant flooding and property damage due to rapid runoff. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread thunderstorms containing intense lightning and heavy rainfall are advancing toward Kauai from the west this morning. Rainfall rates in excess of 1 inch per hour are expected. The strongest thunderstorms will be capable of producing rainfall rates up to 3 inches per hour.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest; Niihau
